column1: 452214,Mountain or Glacier Guide,,"Participate in or lead outdoor adventure activities
column9: Advise and answer questions on historically, culturally or environmentally relevant local interest points
column11: Advise others about land management or conservation
column13: Monitor activities of individuals to ensure safety or compliance with rules
column15: Communicate safety or hazard information to others
column17: Apply knowledge, understanding and respect of culturally significant sites or objects
column19: Monitor environmental conditions to detect hazards
column23: Notify others of emergencies, problems or hazards
column25: Determine methods to minimise environmental impact of activities
column27: Maintain practical knowledge of natural areas
column29: Demonstrate activity techniques or equipment use
column33: Provide patrons with directions to locales or attractions
column37: Inspect equipment to ensure safety or proper functioning
column41: Monitor availability of equipment or supplies
